name: Scratchpaper
description:
I thought it would be neat if I could play a game that looked like a child's drawing - boy did I not expect it to be this hard to make! What you're looking at is three-ish weeks worth of work, and the realization of an idea I've had for several years - I hope it's enjoyable!

Very short - finishable in about 3 - 5 minutes. I prefer to play with a gamepad, but it's also got keyboard support with a couple different control schemes built in. Play now in your browser, or download a copy and take it home! Tell your friends!
